body:
• Different backends can be chosen per bucket!
  • Default backend is Bitcask
    • KV storage engine by Basho specially for Riak
    • Amazingly quick
    • Mixture of Erlang and C
  • Other options are:
    ets, dets, fs, innostore, gb_trees and more
  • Easy to build your own and plug it in (if that's your thing)
